segments.text: I glance into the kitchen and see the woman carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron and a dress, looking so focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is right there by the window, with sunlight streaming in from the garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wait, the faucet is running full blast!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is overflowing from the basin, pouring over the edge like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's splashing onto the floor, forming a big puddle around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't noticed at all; her foot is already wet, but she's just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, there's a boy climbing on a stool to reach the cookie jar in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks really unstable, tilting backward as he stretches up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl is standing nearby, reaching out her hand like she wants a cookie too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is chaotic, with the water and the wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to this mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
